item.title: Kotatogram 1.4 released!
item.description: For a long time this Kotatogram was abandoned. But actually it wasn’t, I just had no time to fix bugs. Some are still can be present, but since mostly it works as it should, I’m releasing to stable branch. Download stable 1.4 based on Telegram Desktop 2.7.1 Windows Supports Windows 7 and higher. 32-bit installer 32-bit portable 64-bit installer 64-bit portable Linux Supports Ubuntu 16.

item.title: New site is now live!
item.description: For a long time this site was abandoned. It featured old releases, old feature list… and that’s it. It was pretty much a placeholder, than something useful. But I think it’s time to give it a new look and content. So, welcome to the new site. Instead of Jekyll, used in GitHub Pages by default, I decided to go with Hugo and modified port of HTML5UP’s Alpha theme. See the source code if you want to fit it for yourself.

item.description: Here tackled some questions that asked pretty frequently. When update? Will ghost mode/blocked users ignore be made? Will Android version be made? My anti-virus detects Kotatogram as a malware! Is it true that account can be banned because of unofficial client usage? Do you have any plans to monetize Kotatogram? When update? I’m trying not to tell exact dates, because usually I fit into them only when everything is ready.

item.title: Local folders
item.description: Warning: This feature currently only in beta. Change log For a long time users have been requested folders, and Telegram made them. But of course, folders have limitations: Folder count: no more than 10 Folder name length: no more than 12 symbols Chat count: 100 explicitly added (including pinned), 100 explicitly excluded Icons: 23 items Filters: chat type, enabled notifications, unread, non-archived Local folders have additional features and they have some limitations removed.
